Help Me 'Sell' Monster Rancher 2 to Someone Who Has Never Ranched!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Miscellaneous Q&A: Help Me 'Sell' Monster Rancher 2 to Someone Who Has Never Ranched!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, October 14, 2004 - 12:22 pm:

I just replied to a thread at GameFAQs, started by a guy who wants to try MR2 but has never played a ranching game. He is asking people to 'sell' him on the game. I replied, but I'd appreciate any comments that people could add to help out.

By Neck Warmer on Friday, October 15, 2004 - 07:34 am:

How about: It is a full scale ranching sim, where you are an aspiring young persona who wishes to become the best by defeating the top five monsters in the land. You can experience all the aspects of running a small stable, but at a rather complex level, allowing for a level of gameplay often unseen in ranching sims.

That do it for ya?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, October 15, 2004 - 10:27 am:

He isn't reading things over here. You have to post on GF, that's what I was asking people to do.
